General.Name: Zhejiang Fuchunjiang Environmental Thermoelectric Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Zhejiang Fuchunjiang Environmental Thermoelectric Co.,LTD. generates and sells electricity and heat in China. The company generates power using solid waste, garbage, and hazardous waste resources. It is also involved in solid waste disposal, hazardous waste disposal co-generation and thermal power energy conservation, and environmental protection business. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
General.Address: No. 138, Jiangbin East Avenue, Hangzhou, China, 311401
